MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G61 area of Glasgow, affecting properties in Milngavie Road and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3pm due to repairs required to the underground electricity network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:04pm on Sunday, 10 January 2021
